QuestData.Title: Shells on the Sea Shore
QuestData.Description: I salvaged these mortars from the wreck of our airship when she detonated above Dragonmaw Port. But ammunition is in short supply!$B$BWhile you're running along the beach, do me a favor and pick up any unexploded mortar shells you find.$B$BUnexploded shells are the best kind - you never know WHEN they're going to go off. Perfect for surprising an enemy!
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 8 Unexploded Mortar Shells along the beach at Slithering Cove.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the shells? Hand them here!$B$B...Gently!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh yeah. YEAH! These are DEFINITELY going to kill somebody.$B$BProbably naga.
